name: AreYouSmarterThanA5thGrader
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: are you smarter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play the official Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader skill for Amazon Alexa!

Answer some of the toughest questions from 1st grade up to 5th grade. Challenge opponents in one-on-one games and get to the top of the leaderboard—proving you're not only smarter than a 5th grader; you're smarter than everyone else!

THE BEST TRIVIA FOR ALEXA
Questions from 22 different school subjects including astronomy, ancient history, music, art, science, and more!
New content added and updates made often!

Become a Brainy Box VIP with a SUBSCRIPTION! The Brainy Box subscription gives you access to local multiplayer so you can play against your friends and family in the same room. As a bonus for signing up, you'll get access to Song Quiz Gold.

Have feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Just email support@volleythat.com
